title: Can Kopecky Deny the Dutch? Ranking the Gold Medal Favorites for the Women’s Olympic Road Race
content:
Will a Dutch 'triple threat' of Vos, Vollering, Wiebes run riot in Paris on Sunday? A whole rabble is raring to ruin Team NL's party. We rate them all.

Read the full article at Can Kopecky Deny the Dutch? Ranking the Gold Medal Favorites for the Women’s Olympic Road Race on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
